thread.title: United revenue passenger miles up 1.3%

author: Gulli Arnason
title: United revenue passenger miles up 1.3%
text:
seat miles) increased 2.2 percent versus June 2014.The airline´s June 2015 consolidated load factor decreased 0.8 points compared to June 2014.United Airlines and United Express operate an average of nearly 5,000 flights a day to 373 airports across six continents. In 2014, United and United Express operated nearly two million flights carrying 138 million customers. The airline is a founding member of Star Alliance, which provides service to 193 countries via 27 member airlines. More than 84,000 United employees reside in every US state and in countries around the world.
